articles.description: England white-ball captain Harry Brook says other players were present when he was involved in an altercation with a nightclub bouncer.
articles.title: Harry Brook: England one-day skipper admits other players were present during nightclub bouncer altercation

articles.description: A slow-burning Australian Open looks set for a final weekend flourish after Novak Djokovic takes the limelight once again in Melbourne.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Novak Djokovic steals show in Melbourne after Carlos Alcaraz denies bending rules

articles.description: Sam Curran takes England's second ever hat-trick in T20 internationals as they beat Sri Lanka by 11 runs (DLS) in Pallekele.
articles.title: Sam Curran: England seamer takes hat-trick as tourists win first T20

articles.description: Mercedes were pre-season favourites for 2026 long before any of the new cars ran on track, and nothing that happened in the Formula 1 'shakedown' in Spain this week has changed that.
articles.title: F1 testing: Barcelona 'shakedown' offers first hints of Formula 1 2026

articles.description: Is a nervousness among Arsenal fans affecting the players in the Premier League title race? Alex Howell looks at what impact this could have on Mikel Arteta's side as they look to end a run of three second-placed finishes.
articles.title: Arsenal: Are Gunners fans making team nervous?

articles.description: Newcastle United face Liverpool on Saturday for the first time since the injured Alexander Isak left the club in September following "the most talked about" saga in world football
articles.title: Liverpool v Newcastle: Life after Alexander Isak and 'the most talked about thing in world football'

articles.description: Fire versus ice - a contrasting match-up of personalities tennis knows all too well. But how might the Australian Open final between Aryna Sabalenka and Elena Rybakina play out?
articles.title: Australian Open 2026 final: Aryna Sabalenka and Elena Rybakina set for explosive women's final

articles.description: Manchester United's interim head coach Michael Carrick is not ruling out the possibility of the club doing business on transfer deadline day
articles.title: Michael Carrick: Man Utd could be active on deadline day, says interim boss

articles.description: West Ham midfielder Lucas Paqueta completes a £35.5m move to boyhood club Flamengo.
articles.title: Lucas Paqueta: West Ham midfielder completes £35.5m move to Flamengo

articles.description: Lindsey Vonn faces a race against time to be fit for the Winter Olympics after being airlifted to hospital following a crash in her final downhill race before the Games.
articles.title: Lindsey Vonn: US alpine skier airlifted to hospital after crash
